page.shortlink: api desktop api object class dial phone function
page.description: Dials the phone number in the control.

argument.name: PhoneNumber
argument.description: Optional. Default = the value in the control that currently has focus. The phone number to dial.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.DIAL_PHONE() method dials the phone number explicitly provided or in the field that currently has focus.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script dials the number in the Home_phone control.
